      • setRaw

        public GnuplotProcessor setRaw(boolean raw)
        Sets whether the processor should output a data file or an image
        Parameters:
        raw - Set to true to output the raw (text) data, rather than the image resulting from running the Gnuplot command on that data
        Returns:
        An instance of this GnuPlot object

        Description copied from class: SingleProcessor
        Computes one or more output events from its input events
        Specified by:
        compute in class SingleProcessor
        Parameters:
        inputs - An array of input events; its length corresponds to the processor's input arity
        Returns:
        A queue of vectors of output events, or null if no event could be produced
